text: Robert 'Rob' Muzio (born 1965), is a male retired cyclist who competed for England. ==Cycling career== He represented England and competed in the 4,000 metres individual pursuit and won a bronze medal in the 4,000 metres team pursuit event, with Chris Boardman, Gary Coltman, Guy Rowland and Jon Walshaw, at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh, Scotland. He was a professional from 1987-1988. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:English male cyclists Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in cycling Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Rob Muzio
